languages.text: "Кстати..." {n}Заметив ваш взгляд, Джай вкрадчиво мурлыкает, скосив взгляд на Кибеллу:{/n} "Шерин, если бы вы повелели своей ручной убийце устроить здесь небольшое представление... Думаю, очередь значительно уменьшилась бы".

"Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."
languages.original_text: "Кстати..." {n}Заметив ваш взгляд, Джай вкрадчиво мурлыкает, скосив взгляд на Кибеллу:{/n} "Шерин, если бы вы повелели своей ручной убийце устроить здесь небольшое представление... Думаю, очередь значительно уменьшилась бы".

traits.locale_text: "Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

"Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

"Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

"Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

"Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

"Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

languages.text: «En realidad...». {n}Tras llamar tu atención, Jae ronronea discretamente y mira a Kibellah:{/n} «Shereen, si encargara a su asesina que hiciera de las suyas en esta sala... seguro que la cola se reduciría considerablemente».
languages.original_text: "Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

traits.locale_text: «En realidad...». {n}Tras llamar tu atención, Jae ronronea discretamente y mira a Kibellah:{/n} «Shereen, si encargara a su asesina que hiciera de las suyas en esta sala... seguro que la cola se reduciría considerablemente».

languages.text: 「実は…」{n}あなたと目が合ったジェイは、キベラに視線を送りながらこっそりとつぶやいた。{/n}「シャリーン、あなたのペットの殺し屋に、今この部屋でちょっとしたショーをやるように言えば…行列はもっと短くなるでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

traits.locale_text: 「実は…」{n}あなたと目が合ったジェイは、キベラに視線を送りながらこっそりとつぶやいた。{/n}「シャリーン、あなたのペットの殺し屋に、今この部屋でちょっとしたショーをやるように言えば…行列はもっと短くなるでしょうね」

languages.text: “老实说……”{n}婕伊留意到你的目光之后，她一边盯着绮贝菈，一边嘀嘀咕咕地开了口。{/n}“亲爱的，如果你能让你的宠物刺客在这里进行一场小小表演的话……我敢说排队的人肯定会少很多。”
languages.original_text: "Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

traits.locale_text: “老实说……”{n}婕伊留意到你的目光之后，她一边盯着绮贝菈，一边嘀嘀咕咕地开了口。{/n}“亲爱的，如果你能让你的宠物刺客在这里进行一场小小表演的话……我敢说排队的人肯定会少很多。”

languages.text: "Eigentlich ..." {n}Nachdem Jae sich deines Blicks gewiss ist, schnurrt sie wiederholt und sieht dabei Kibellah an.{/n} "Shereen, wenn Ihr Eurer Kuschelassassinin befehlen würdet, jetzt in diesem Raum eine kleine Show abzuziehen ... dann würde die Warteschlange bestimmt viel kürzer."
languages.original_text: "Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

traits.locale_text: "Eigentlich ..." {n}Nachdem Jae sich deines Blicks gewiss ist, schnurrt sie wiederholt und sieht dabei Kibellah an.{/n} "Shereen, wenn Ihr Eurer Kuschelassassinin befehlen würdet, jetzt in diesem Raum eine kleine Show abzuziehen ... dann würde die Warteschlange bestimmt viel kürzer."

languages.text: « Maintenant que j'y pense, shereen... {n}Après avoir accroché votre regard, Jae se met à susurrer d'une voix enjôleuse tout en observant Kibellah :{/n} Si vous vouliez bien demander à votre assassin préféré de nous gratifier d'une petite démonstration... je parie que la queue se réduirait aussitôt à peau de chagrin. »
languages.original_text: "Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que j'y pense, shereen... {n}Après avoir accroché votre regard, Jae se met à susurrer d'une voix enjôleuse tout en observant Kibellah :{/n} Si vous vouliez bien demander à votre assassin préféré de nous gratifier d'une petite démonstration... je parie que la queue se réduirait aussitôt à peau de chagrin. »

languages.text: "Aslında..." {n}Jae, bakışlarını fark etmesinin ardından Kibellah'ya bakarak gizlice mırıldanmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Şirinim, evcil suikastçına şu an burada ufak bir gösteri yapmasını söylersen... Sıranın çok daha kısalacağına eminim."
languages.original_text: "Actually..." {n}After catching your eye, Jae purrs surreptitiously as she glances at Kibellah,{/n} "Shereen, if you were to tell your pet assassin to put on a little show in this room right now... I bet the queue would get a lot shorter."
